dialogue_turns.speaker: Philip
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's aviation sector is about to get a major boost starting next month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's aviation sector is about to get a major boost starting next month.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting in May 2025, Kazakhstan will launch new flights to ten foreign countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Sarah
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they're launching new flights to ten different countries, including Hungary, Germany, and Turkey, among others.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they're launching new flights to ten different countries, including Hungary, Germany, and Turkey, among others.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting in May 2025, Kazakhstan will launch new flights to ten foreign countries. According to the press service of the Ministry of Transport, new direct routes will be operated to the following countries: Hungary, Germany, Turkey, Georgia, Azerbaijan, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, China, South Korea, and Vietnam.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Philip
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just one airline—Qazaq Air already started flying from Astana to Samarkand in Uzbekistan on May 1st, twice a week, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just one airline-Qazaq Air already started flying from Astana to Samarkand in Uzbekistan on May first, twice a week, I think.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Qazaq Air began operating a new route on May 1: Astana " Turkistan " Samarkand (Uzbekistan). Flights are scheduled twice a week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Sarah
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and then My Freighter, that's an Uzbek carrier, began the Almaty to Tashkent route just a few days later, also twice weekly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and then My Freighter, that's an Uzbek carrier, began the Almaty to Tashkent route just a few days later, also twice weekly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 5, Uzbek airline My Freighter (Centrum Air) launched the Almaty " Tashkent route, also with two weekly flights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Philip
dialogue_turns.text: SCAT Airlines is getting in on the action too, with four new routes out of Shymkent later this month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: S C A T Airlines is getting in on the action too, with four new routes out of Shymkent later this month.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: SCAT Airlines will launch four new routes from Shymkent in May: Starting May 27: Starting May 29:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Sarah
dialogue_turns.text: And Air Astana and Fly Arystan are expanding as well—Fly Arystan is adding two new routes, including one to Gazipasa, which is the airport for Alanya, that popular Turkish resort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Air Astana and Fly Arystan are expanding as well-Fly Arystan is adding two new routes, including one to Gazipasa, which is the airport for Alanya, that popular Turkish resort.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Air Astana is also expanding its network: Fly Arystan will add two new routes: Gazipasa is the nearest airport to Alanya, a popular Mediterranean resort.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Philip
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, nice! Plus, Azerbaijan Airlines is upping their Astana to Baku flights from three to four times a week starting May 13th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, nice! Plus, Azerbaijan Airlines is upping their Astana to Baku flights from three to four times a week starting May thirteenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, Azerbaijan Airlines will increase the frequency of flights on the Astana " Baku route from 3 to 4 times per week starting May 13.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Sarah
dialogue_turns.text: And then, come June 1st, there's a whole new player—Air Arabia Abu Dhabi will begin operating in Kazakhstan, flying directly to Almaty three times a week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, come June first, there's a whole new player-Air Arabia Abu Dhabi will begin operating in Kazakhstan, flying directly to Almaty three times a week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It's also worth noting that from June 1, 2025, a new international airline will begin operating in Kazakhstan " Air Arabia Abu Dhabi. The airline plans to launch regular direct flights on the Abu Dhabi " Almaty route. Flights will be operated three times a week " on Tuesdays, Fridays, and Sundays, using Airbus A320 aircraft.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Philip
dialogue_turns.text: On Tuesdays, Fridays, and Sundays, using Airbus A320s. That's a pretty solid schedule for travelers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: On Tuesdays, Fridays, and Sundays, using Airbus A320s. That's a pretty solid schedule for travelers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Flights will be operated three times a week " on Tuesdays, Fridays, and Sundays, using Airbus A320 aircraft.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Sarah
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It's gonna be so much easier to hop over to some of these places now without all those layovers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It's gonna be so much easier to hop over to some of these places now without all those layovers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Philip
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Just gotta remember to check the airlines' official sites for the latest schedules, though—things can always change.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Just gotta remember to check the airlines' official sites for the latest schedules, though-things can always change.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Up-to-date flight schedules can be tracked on the official websites of airlines and online booking systems.
